profile.name: Dany Setiyawan
profile.bio: Junior Fullstack Developer passionate about building web apps, exploring clean code, and learning new tech every day.

timeSync.text: your morning eyes I could stare like watching stars
I could walk you by and I'll tell without a thought
would you mind if I took your hand tonight
know you're all that I want and more
I imagine we fell in love on the moonlit skies with you
I think I'll picture us two with the waves, the oceans
colors on your face, I'll leave my heart with your hand
so let me fly with you, will you be forever with me?
My love will always stay by you
I'll keep it safe, so don't you worry a thing
I'll tell you I love you more
It's stuck with you forever, so promise you won't let it go
I'll trust the universe will always bring me to you
I imagine we fell in love on the moonlit skies with you
I think I'll picture us two with the waves, the oceans
colors on your face, I'll leave my heart with your hand
so let me fly with you, will you be forever with me?
